docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: MORE than 20 years ago, an advisory committee to the United States Surgeon General undertook a historic examination of the existing scientific data on tobacco use. The conclusion of this, and every Surgeon General's report that followed, was that smoking is a health hazard of enormous proportions.
